javadoc: Panel to resolve conflicts on memory blocks.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: mergeManager
params.comment:
merge manager needed to enable the Apply button
 when an option is chosen to resolve a conflict

params.name: totalConflicts
params.comment: total number of conflicts to be resolved

methods.name: setConflictInfo
methods.comment: Set the conflict information on the panel.

params.name: panelID
params.comment:
ID of which panel to show, either COMMENT_PANEL_ID or
 CONFLICT_PANEL_ID

params.name: title
params.comment: title to use in the border of this panel

params.name: latestStr
params.comment: text to show from LATEST program

params.name: myStr
params.comment: text to show from MY program

params.name: origStr
params.comment: text to show from ORIGINAL program

methods.javadoc: Get the selected option; called after the Apply button was hit.
methods.name: getSelectedOption
methods.comment: Get the selected option; called after the Apply button was hit.

methods.javadoc:
Selects or deselects the checkbox.
@param useForAll true means select the checkbox.
methods.name: setUseForAll

methods.javadoc:
Returns whether or not the checkbox is selected.
@return true if the checkbox is selected.
methods.name: getUseForAll
methods.comment: Returns whether or not the checkbox is selected.

return.comment: true if the checkbox is selected.

name: MemoryMergePanel
comment: Panel to resolve conflicts on memory blocks.
